_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Information system on forest genetic resources.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The [EUFGIS](http://www.eufgis.org) project (April 2007-March 2011) created an online information system for forest genetic resources (FGR) inventories in Europe to support the countries in their efforts to implement FGR conservation as part of sustainable forest management.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: A clearly mapped area of forest or woodland where dynamic gene conservation is one of the main management priorities for one or more tree species.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Namespace grouping all terms and descriptors specific to gene conservation units.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Tree species population living in a gene conservation unit designated to be monitored and documented.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Namespace grouping all terms and descriptors specific to gene conservation unit populations.
Namespace collecting descriptors regarding gene conservation unit location.
Namespace collecting descriptors regarding gene conservation unit coordinates and topography.
Namespace collecting descriptors regarding gene conservation unit remarks and comments.
Namespace collecting descriptors regarding gene conservation unit restrictions.
